quote: I want to be the best REALTOR on the planet. Just this planet.
why_clipworthy: It's a bold statement that captures Dan's ambition and sets the tone for his approach.
suggested_hook: What does it take to be the best REALTOR on the planet?

quote: I became a questionologist. We study and use questions in our practice.
why_clipworthy: Encourages agents to focus on asking the right questions rather than just delivering scripts.
suggested_hook: Why being a 'questionologist' can transform your real estate career.
